verses.verse: Now it <S%H1961>came<s%> about in the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> in the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> <S%H2320>[month,<s%>] on the <S%H6218>tenth<s%> of the month, that <S%H376>certain<s%> of the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H1875>inquire<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and <S%H3427>sat<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me.
And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1121>"Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> to the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to them, <S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> "Do you <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H1875>inquire<s%> of Me? As I <S%H2416>live,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> "I will not be <S%H1875>inquired<s%> of by you. "'
"Will you <S%H8199>judge<s%> them, will you <S%H8199>judge<s%> them, <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>? Make them <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H8441>abominations<s%> of their fathers;

and <S%H559>say<s%> to them, <S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> "On the <S%H3117>day<s%> when I <S%H977>chose<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and <S%H5375>swore<s%> <S%H3027><s%> to the <S%H2233>descendants<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> and <S%H3045>made<s%> Myself <S%H3045>known<s%> to them in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> when I <S%H5375>swore<s%> <S%H3027><s%> to them, <S%H559>saying,<s%> I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%>

on that <S%H3117>day<s%> I <S%H5375>swore<s%> <S%H3027><s%> to them, to <S%H3318>bring<s%> them out from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> into a <S%H776>land<s%> that I had <S%H8446>selected<s%> for them, <S%H2100>flowing<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey,<s%> <S%H1931>which<s%> is the <S%H9469>glory<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H776>lands.<s%>

"And I <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H7993>'Cast<s%> <S%H7993>away,<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> of you, the <S%H8251>detestable<s%> <S%H8251>things<s%> of his <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and do not <S%H2930>defile<s%> yourselves with the <S%H1544>idols<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>'

"But they <S%H4784>rebelled<s%> against Me and were not <S%H14>willing<s%> to <S%H8085>listen<s%> to Me; they did not <S%H7993>cast<s%> <S%H7993>away<s%> the <S%H8251>detestable<s%> <S%H8251>things<s%> of their <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> did they <S%H5800>forsake<s%> the <S%H1544>idols<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%> Then I <S%H559>resolved<s%> to <S%H8210>pour<s%> out My <S%H2534>wrath<s%> on them, to <S%H3615>accomplish<s%> My <S%H639>anger<s%> against them in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

"But I <S%H6213>acted<s%> for the <S%H4616>sake<s%> of My <S%H8034>name,<s%> that it should not be <S%H2490>profaned<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> they [lived,] in <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H5869>sight<s%> I <S%H3045>made<s%> Myself <S%H3045>known<s%> to them by <S%H3318>bringing<s%> them out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>
"So I <S%H3318>took<s%> them out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> them into the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>

"And I <S%H5414>gave<s%> them My <S%H2708>statutes<s%> and <S%H3045>informed<s%> them of My <S%H4941>ordinances,<s%> by <S%H834>which,<s%> if a <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H6213>observes<s%> them, he will <S%H2421>live.<s%>

"And <S%H1571>also<s%> I <S%H5414>gave<s%> them My <S%H7676>sabbaths<s%> to be a <S%H226>sign<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> Me and them, that they might <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> who <S%H6942>sanctifies<s%> them.

"But the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H4784>rebelled<s%> against Me in the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%> They did not <S%H1980>walk<s%> in My <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> and they <S%H3988>rejected<s%> My <S%H4941>ordinances,<s%> by <S%H834>which,<s%> if a <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H6213>observes<s%> them, he will <S%H2421>live;<s%> and My <S%H7676>sabbaths<s%> they <S%H3966>greatly<s%> <S%H2490>profaned.<s%> Then I <S%H559>resolved<s%> to <S%H8210>pour<s%> out My <S%H2534>wrath<s%> on them in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> to <S%H3615>annihilate<s%> them.

"But I <S%H6213>acted<s%> for the <S%H4616>sake<s%> of My <S%H8034>name,<s%> that it should not be <S%H2490>profaned<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> before <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H5869>sight<s%> I had <S%H3318>brought<s%> them out.

"And <S%H1571>also<s%> I <S%H5375>swore<s%> <S%H3027><s%> to them in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> that I would not <S%H935>bring<s%> them into the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I had <S%H5414>given<s%> them, <S%H2100>flowing<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey,<s%> <S%H1931>which<s%> is the <S%H9469>glory<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H776>lands,<s%>

<S%H3282>because<s%> they <S%H3988>rejected<s%> My <S%H4941>ordinances,<s%> and as for My <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> they did not <S%H1980>walk<s%> in them; they even <S%H2490>profaned<s%> My <S%H7676>sabbaths,<s%> for their <S%H3820>heart<s%> continually <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> their <S%H1544>idols.<s%>

"Yet My <S%H5869>eye<s%> <S%H2347>spared<s%> them <S%H4480>rather<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> <S%H7843>destroying<s%> them, and I did not <S%H6213>cause<s%> their <S%H3617>annihilation<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>

"And I <S%H559>said<s%> to their <S%H1121>children<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> 'Do not <S%H1980>walk<s%> in the <S%H2706>statutes<s%> of your fathers, or <S%H1>keep<s%> their <S%H8104>ordinances,<s%> or <S%H4941>defile<s%> yourselves with their <S%H2930>idols.<s%>
'I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God;<s%> <S%H1980>walk<s%> in My <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> and <S%H8104>keep<s%> My <S%H4941>ordinances,<s%> and <S%H6213>observe<s%> them.

'And <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> My <S%H7676>sabbaths;<s%> and they shall be a <S%H226>sign<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> Me and you, that you may <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>'

"But the <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H4784>rebelled<s%> against Me; they did not <S%H1980>walk<s%> in My <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> were they <S%H8104>careful<s%> to <S%H6213>observe<s%> My <S%H4941>ordinances,<s%> by <S%H834>which,<s%> [if] a <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H6213>observes<s%> them, he will <S%H2421>live;<s%> they <S%H2490>profaned<s%> My <S%H7676>sabbaths.<s%> So I <S%H559>resolved<s%> to <S%H8210>pour<s%> out My <S%H2534>wrath<s%> on them, to <S%H3615>accomplish<s%> My <S%H639>anger<s%> against them in the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>

"But I <S%H7725>withdrew<s%> My <S%H3027>hand<s%> and <S%H6213>acted<s%> for the <S%H4616>sake<s%> of My <S%H8034>name,<s%> that it should not be <S%H2490>profaned<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%> in <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H5869>sight<s%> I had <S%H3318>brought<s%> them out.

<S%H1571>"Also<s%> I <S%H5375>swore<s%> <S%H3027><s%> to them in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> that I would <S%H6327>scatter<s%> them among the <S%H1471>nations<s%> and <S%H2219>disperse<s%> them among the <S%H776>lands,<s%>

<S%H3282>because<s%> they had not <S%H6213>observed<s%> My <S%H4941>ordinances,<s%> but had <S%H3988>rejected<s%> My <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> and had <S%H2490>profaned<s%> My <S%H7676>sabbaths,<s%> and their <S%H5869>eyes<s%> were on the <S%H1544>idols<s%> of their fathers.
"And I <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> them <S%H2706>statutes<s%> that were not <S%H2896>good<s%> and <S%H4941>ordinances<s%> by which they could not <S%H2421>live;<s%>

and I <S%H2930>pronounced<s%> them <S%H2930>unclean<s%> because of their <S%H4979>gifts,<s%> in that they caused <S%H3605>all<s%> their first-born to <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H5674>through<s%> [the fire] <S%H4616>so<s%> that I might <S%H8074>make<s%> them <S%H8074>desolate,<s%> in <S%H4616>order<s%> that they might <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%> "'

<S%H3651>"Therefore,<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to them, <S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> <S%H5750>"Yet<s%> in <S%H2088>this<s%> your fathers have <S%H1>blasphemed<s%> Me by <S%H1442>acting<s%> <S%H4603>treacherously<s%> against Me.

"When I had <S%H935>brought<s%> them into the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H5375>swore<s%> <S%H3027><s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> to them, then they <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H7311>high<s%> <S%H1389>hill<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H5687>leafy<s%> <S%H6086>tree,<s%> and they <S%H2076>offered<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> their <S%H2077>sacrifices,<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> they <S%H5414>presented<s%> the <S%H3708>provocation<s%> of their <S%H7133>offering.<s%> <S%H8033>There<s%> also they <S%H7760>made<s%> their <S%H5207>soothing<s%> <S%H7381>aroma,<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> they <S%H5258>poured<s%> out their <S%H5262>libations.<s%>

"Then I <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H4100>'What<s%> is the <S%H1116>high<s%> <S%H1116>place<s%> to <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H935>go<s%>?' So its <S%H8034>name<s%> is <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H1117>Bamah<s%> to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>"'

<S%H3651>"Therefore,<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> "Will you <S%H2930>defile<s%> yourselves after the <S%H1870>manner<s%> of your fathers and <S%H1>play<s%> the <S%H2181>harlot<s%> <S%H2181>after<s%> their <S%H310>detestable<s%> <S%H8251>things<s%>?

"And when you <S%H5375>offer<s%> your <S%H4979>gifts,<s%> when you cause your <S%H1121>sons<s%> to <S%H5674>pass<s%> through the <S%H784>fire,<s%> you are <S%H2930>defiling<s%> yourselves with <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H1544>idols<s%> to this <S%H3117>day.<s%> And shall I be <S%H1875>inquired<s%> of by you, O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>? As I <S%H2416>live,<s%> <S%H5002>"declares<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> "I will not be <S%H1875>inquired<s%> of by you.

"And what <S%H5927>comes<s%> into your <S%H7307>mind<s%> will not <S%H1961>come<s%> about, <S%H834>when<s%> you <S%H559>say:<s%> 'We will be like the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> like the <S%H4940>tribes<s%> of the <S%H776>lands,<s%> <S%H8334>serving<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%> and <S%H68>stone.<s%>'

"As I <S%H2416>live,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> <S%H518>"surely<s%> <S%H3808><s%> with a <S%H2389>mighty<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> and with an <S%H5186>outstretched<s%> <S%H2220>arm<s%> and with <S%H2534>wrath<s%> <S%H8210>poured<s%> out, I shall be <S%H4427>king<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> you.

"And I shall <S%H3318>bring<s%> you out from the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> and <S%H6908>gather<s%> you from the <S%H776>lands<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> you are <S%H6327>scattered,<s%> with a <S%H2389>mighty<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> and with an <S%H5186>outstretched<s%> <S%H2220>arm<s%> and with <S%H2534>wrath<s%> <S%H8210>poured<s%> out;

and I shall <S%H935>bring<s%> you into the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of the <S%H5971>peoples,<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> I shall <S%H8199>enter<s%> into <S%H8199>judgment<s%> with you <S%H6440>face<s%> to <S%H6440>face.<s%>

"As I <S%H8199>entered<s%> into <S%H8199>judgment<s%> with your fathers in the <S%H1>wilderness<s%> of the <S%H4057>land<s%> of <S%H776>Egypt,<s%> <S%H4714>so<s%> I will <S%H3651>enter<s%> into <S%H8199>judgment<s%> with you," <S%H8199>declares<s%> the <S%H5002>Lord<s%> <S%H136>God.<s%>
"And I shall make you <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H7626>rod,<s%> and I shall <S%H935>bring<s%> you into the <S%H4562>bond<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant;<s%>

and I shall <S%H1305>purge<s%> from you the <S%H4775>rebels<s%> and those who <S%H6586>transgress<s%> against Me; I shall <S%H3318>bring<s%> them out of the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H4033>where<s%> they <S%H4033>sojourn,<s%> but they will not <S%H935>enter<s%> the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> Thus you will <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

"As for you, O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%>" <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> <S%H1980>"Go,<s%> <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H376>everyone<s%> his <S%H1544>idols;<s%> but <S%H310>later,<s%> you will <S%H518>surely<s%> <S%H369><s%> <S%H8085>listen<s%> to Me, and My <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%> you will <S%H2490>profane<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>longer<s%> with your <S%H4979>gifts<s%> and with your <S%H1544>idols.<s%>

"For on My <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> on the <S%H4791>high<s%> <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> <S%H8033>"there<s%> the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> of them, will <S%H5647>serve<s%> Me in the <S%H776>land;<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> I shall <S%H7521>accept<s%> them, and <S%H8033>there<s%> I shall <S%H1875>seek<s%> your <S%H8641>contributions<s%> and the <S%H7225>choicest<s%> of your <S%H4864>gifts,<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H6944>things.<s%>

"As a <S%H5207>soothing<s%> <S%H7381>aroma<s%> I shall <S%H7521>accept<s%> you, when I <S%H3318>bring<s%> you out from the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> and <S%H6908>gather<s%> you from the <S%H776>lands<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> you are <S%H6327>scattered;<s%> and I shall <S%H6942>prove<s%> Myself <S%H6942>holy<s%> among you in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations.<s%>

"And you will <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> when I <S%H935>bring<s%> you into the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H5375>swore<s%> <S%H3027><s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> to your forefathers.

"And <S%H8033>there<s%> you will <S%H2142>remember<s%> your <S%H1870>ways<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H5949>deeds,<s%> with <S%H834>which<s%> you have <S%H2930>defiled<s%> yourselves; and you will <S%H6962>loathe<s%> yourselves in your own <S%H6440>sight<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H7451>things<s%> that you have <S%H6213>done.<s%>

"Then you will <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> when I have <S%H6213>dealt<s%> with you for My name's <S%H4616>sake,<s%> not according to your <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1870>ways<s%> or according to your <S%H7843>corrupt<s%> <S%H5949>deeds,<s%> O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God.<s%>' "
Now the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1121>"Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H7760>set<s%> your <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H1870>toward<s%> <S%H8487>Teman,<s%> and <S%H5197>speak<s%> out <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H1864>south,<s%> and <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H9194>forest<s%> <S%H7704>land<s%> of the <S%H5045>Negev,<s%>

and <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H9194>forest<s%> of the <S%H5045>Negev,<s%> <S%H8085>'Hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord:<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> I am about to <S%H3341>kindle<s%> a <S%H784>fire<s%> in you, and it shall <S%H398>consume<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H3892>green<s%> <S%H6086>tree<s%> in you, as well as <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H3002>dry<s%> <S%H6086>tree;<s%> the <S%H3852>blazing<s%> <S%H3852>flame<s%> will not be <S%H3518>quenched,<s%> and the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H6440>surface<s%> from <S%H5045>south<s%> to <S%H6828>north<s%> will be <S%H6866>burned<s%> by it.
"And <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> will <S%H7200>see<s%> that I, the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> have <S%H1197>kindled<s%> it; it shall not be <S%H3518>quenched.<s%>"' "
Then I <S%H559>said,<s%> "Ah <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God!<s%> They are <S%H559>saying<s%> of me, 'Is he not [just] <S%H9301>speaking<s%> <S%H4912>parables<s%>?'"
